name: Naughty or Nice Scanner HD
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true naughty or nice scanner functionality.

Have you kids been Naughty or Nice this year? With the Naughty or Nice Scanner you can pretend to find out!

You can encourage your children to be good by rigging the results. The app will always give a naughty result unless you press the secret button.

Features:
- Encourages children to be good
- Ability to enter your child's name
- Rig the results.
